mapper.select: SELECT style_id, img, content, TO_CHAR(rgdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as dbday, bookmark, (SELECT email FROM user_2 WHERE user_id = u_id ) as email, rcount, num FROM (SELECT style_id, img, content, rgdate, bookmark, u_id, rcount, rownum as num FROM (SELECT /*+ INDEX_ASC(style_2 pk_style_2)*/ style_id, img, content, rgdate, bookmark, u_id, rcount FROM style_2 ORDER BY style_id desc)) WHERE num BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end} ORDER BY style_id desc
SELECT user_id FROM user_2 WHERE email=#{email}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO style_2(style_id, content, img, u_id) VALUES ((SELECT NVL(MAX(style_id)+1,1) FROM style_2), #{content}, #{img}, (SELECT user_id FROM user_2 WHERE email=#{email}))
